name: DotLightRing
0:
”Alexa, open Dot Light Ring”
”Alexa, start Dot Light Ring”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dot light ring
des:
There is a good description of the meaning of the spinning, pulsing light ring on your Echo device on the Amazon help pages, but its much easer to just ask Alexa. 

Please note that there is a distinction between a single flash and a steady pulsing of a light when describing it to the skill. 

Some of the light patterns are hard to descrice, such as the "alternating solid blue and cyan" (device is responding)
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
